text: (he nabee!) kah doh kya main tumhen isase uttam cheez bata doon? unake lie jo daren, unake paalanahaar ke paas aise svarg hain, jinamen naharen bah rahee hain. ve unamen sadaavaasee honge aur nirmal patniyaan hongee tatha allaah kee prasannata praapt hogee aur allaah apane bhakton ko dekh raha hai
